docs.snippet: Florida State's Jameis Winston racked up frequent flier miles last weekend traveling back and forth between a baseball series at Georgia Tech and the Seminoles' football spring game Saturday. The Heisman winner traveled to Atlanta and played Frida...
docs.lead_paragraph: Florida State's Jameis Winston racked up frequent flier miles last weekend traveling back and forth between a baseball series at Georgia Tech and the Seminoles' football spring game Saturday. The Heisman winner traveled to Atlanta and played Friday, flew back Saturday morning and played in the afternoon spring game before flying back to Atlanta that evening.

headline.main: Heisman Winner Winston Shines on Busy Weekend
headline.print_headline: Heisman Winner Winston Shines on Busy Weekend

docs.snippet: An alliance of shipping interests and a billionaire car dealer launched a newspaper ad on Monday protesting retired English soccer star David Beckham's plans for a soccer arena at the port of Miami, saying it threatens the city's plans to capitali...
docs.lead_paragraph: An alliance of shipping interests and a billionaire car dealer launched a newspaper ad on Monday protesting retired English soccer star David Beckham's plans for a soccer arena at the port of Miami, saying it threatens the city's plans to capitalize on the expansion of the Panama Canal.

headline.main: Shipping Alliance Opposes Beckham's Miami Arena Plan

docs.snippet: J. P. and Paul Norden each lost a leg in the Boston Marathon bombings one year ago, but they do not want to be defined by a single moment of violence....
docs.lead_paragraph: J. P. and Paul Norden each lost a leg in the Boston Marathon bombings one year ago, but they do not want to be defined by a single moment of violence.
docs.abstract: Profile of brothers Paul and J P Norden, who each lost a leg in Boston Marathon bombings, and who have been overwhelmed with attention as one-year anniversary of event approaches; occasion has assumed enormous symbolic significance as survivors and Boston itself are determined to show their defiance and resilience.

headline.main: A Year After the Boston Marathon Bombings, Injured Brothers Endure
headline.print_headline: Year After Boston Marathon Bombings, Injured Brothers Endure
